ManualUninstallMessage.message:
To uninstall the extension manually:

  • Click Tools -> Extensions.
  • Select Sticky Password manager & safe from the list and click Remove.
  • Make sure to close all browser windows to completely remove the extension.

appDesc.message: Web form and password filling companion for Sticky Password manager & safe

HostOutdateNotify.message: Sticky Password is outdated and not compatible with this extension. Please update Sticky Password.

ExtensionOutdateNotify.message: This extension is outdated and not compatible with Sticky Password. Please update this extension.

ExtensionNotAuthenticatedNotify.message: The Sticky Password manager & safe is not allowed. Please relaunch browser and allow this extension.

ControlledByOtherExtension.message: Other extension is controlling this setting

NotInstalledNotify.message: Sticky Password is not installed or running. Please, visit Sticky Password homepage and install it to use all it's features.

AutoUninstallErrorMessage.message: Error while automatically uninstalling Sticky Password manager & safe:

BrowserAutofillDescription.message: Sticky Password will save and autofill your password and form data, but you can allow the browser to work with web forms as well. Check the box(es) to allow the browser's built-in features:

AutoUninstallingMessage.message: Please wait, while Sticky Password manager & safe is automatically uninstalled...
